name: KiddeAlarm
0:
”Alexa, launch kidde alarm”
”smoke level at kitchen”
”Alexa, Ask Kidde Alarm status in the kitchen?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kidde alarm
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With your voice, you can monitor the status of your (1) Kidde Smoke Alarm with smart features, (2) Kidde Smoke alarm with Indoor Air Quality, (3) Kidde Smoke + Carbon Monoxide Alarm with smart features, (4) Kidde Smoke + Carbon Monoxide Alarm with Indoor Air Quality, (5) Carbon Monoxide + Indoor Air Quality, and (6) Water Leak + Freeze Detector.

Once the skill is enabled and your account is linked, you can say “Alexa, ask Kidde alarm...”

You can ask about the status of your alarm and monitor smoke, carbon monoxide, battery and device end-of-life levels in your home.

Examples include:
“Alexa, what is the status of the kitchen detector?”
“Alexa, what is the status of my basement water leak detector?"
